actions.name: Suspicious Minds
actions.description: Effect: An additonal Stack is removed from the Affliction as if the creature ended their Activation again, proviking all of the pertinent end-of-Activation effects. This may be triggered a number of times on a creature per Affliction they possess, spending PP for each one.

cost.trigger: A creature in range suffers effect damage from an Affliction due to a Stack being removed.
